definitions.definition: The act of abolishing; an annulling; abrogation
definitions.example: the abolition of debts;   the abolition of laws;   the abolition of slavery;   the abolition of police;;   the abolition of taxes

definitions.definition: (often capitalised) The ending of the slave trade or of slavery.
(often capitalised) The ending of convict transportation.
An amnesty; a putting out of memory.
